Paragraph: Union leaders outraged by WTO snub to ILO head .

| --- |
| WTO (World Trade Organization) |
| ILO (International Labour Organization) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

| Location |
| --- |

| ILO (International Labour Organization) |

(Note: In this context, both WTO and ILO can be considered locations as they are organizations with specific headquarters and places of operation.)
